string.name: intro
string.br: B-Bot is designed for the students and faculty to communicate and have conversation regarding the college. \n
B-Bot will be integrated with the BMS College of Engineering website where the viewers can asks any queries regarding the college. \n

This app was designed by Shravya K and Vaishalini D who are students of BMS College of Engineering. This app was created as our 3rd semester Mobile Application project. We would like to thank our Guide Prof. V Padmapriya for the guidance and support.\n
The authors of this app are:\n\n

string.name: appintro
string.br: B-Bot is designed for the students and faculty to communicate and have conversation regarding the college. \n
